After forming the necessary [[hand seals|seals]], Yamato is able to turn an area into a vast forest in a matter of mere moments complete with trees and grass growing out of any terrain he is on. This technique is very similar to [[Hashirama]]'s [[Wood Release Secret Technique: Nativity of a World of Trees|signature technique]], albeit on a somewhat smaller scale.

== Trivia ==
* In Japanese, {{Translation|sea of trees|樹海|jukai}} is an idiom referring to a large expanse of dense woodland.

[[fr:Mokuton - Forêt des Essences Marines]]
